alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Toole and Liberty (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 10 at 2:06AM MST until January 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera Counties, and Eastern Toole and Liberty Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from noon today to 5 PM MST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM Thursday to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Toole and Liberty
